text: @KamalaHarris Witch, it's NOT mandatory, but if it were, We wud still NOT wear one! Mask do NOT Stop the spread of Coronavirus, says dr Fauci! Instead, it collects germs from airborne viruses that stay trapped inside your China made Masks! https://t.co/QrEEmxhIXe
